header.title: Sebastian Andres Rubio Palominos
header.subtitle: Senior Front-End Developer | Angular & React Expert | CISA Certified

home.hero_title: Hi, I'm Sebastian Andres Rubio Palominos
home.hero_subtitle: Senior Front-End Developer | Angular & React Expert | CISA Certified
home.hero_description: Proactive and results-driven Senior Front-End Developer with over 10 years of international experience across Chile, Australia, and the US. Strong expertise in building scalable, performant web apps using Angular, React, and AWS. Proven ability to lead UI/UX improvements, architect micro-frontend structures, and deliver high-quality user interfaces in fast-paced, Agile environments.

about.page_subtitle: Get to know more about my journey, skills, and passion for frontend development
about.story_paragraph_1: With over 10 years of international experience across Chile, Australia, and the US, I've had the privilege of working with diverse teams and technologies to create exceptional digital experiences. My journey began with a Bachelor's in Computer and Informatics Engineering from the University of Santiago of Chile, followed by a Master's degree from MIT/MITM at the University of Sydney.
about.story_paragraph_2: I specialize in modern JavaScript frameworks, particularly Angular (2-15) and React.js, and I'm passionate about creating scalable, performant web applications. My expertise spans micro-frontend architectures, component-based design, and delivering high-quality user interfaces in fast-paced, Agile environments. I have extensive experience in industries including logistics, travel, finance, e-learning, and SaaS.
about.story_paragraph_3: As a CISA Certified Information Systems Auditor, I bring a unique combination of technical expertise and security awareness to every project. I'm always eager to take on new challenges and continue growing in this ever-evolving field, with a focus on leading UI/UX improvements and architecting scalable solutions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long does a typical project take?
faq.a1: Project timelines vary based on complexity and scope. Simple websites may take 2-4 weeks, while complex applications can take 3-6 months. I provide detailed timeline estimates after understanding your requirements.
faq.q2: Do you work with international clients?
faq.a2: Absolutely! I work with clients worldwide and am comfortable with different time zones. I use modern collaboration tools to ensure smooth communication throughout the project.
faq.q3: What technologies do you specialize in?
faq.a3: I specialize in Angular, React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. I also have experience with Node.js, databases, and cloud platforms like AWS and Firebase.
faq.a4: Yes, I offer maintenance and support packages for projects after completion. This includes bug fixes, updates, security patches, and minor feature enhancements.
faq.q5: Can you help with existing projects?
faq.a5: Definitely! I can help improve existing codebases, add new features, optimize performance, or migrate to newer technologies. I start with a thorough code review and assessment.
faq.q6: What is your preferred payment structure?
faq.a6: I typically work with milestone-based payments: 30% upfront, 40% at midpoint, and 30% on completion. For longer projects, we can discuss monthly payment schedules.

intro.line1: Welcome to the settings and technical overview section of my portfolio application. This page showcases the comprehensive features and modern development practices implemented throughout the project.
intro.line2: Here you can explore the technical architecture, development statistics, and the cutting-edge technologies that power this Angular 20 application, demonstrating my expertise in modern frontend development.
intro.line3: Each section below highlights specific aspects of the application, from responsive design and internationalization to performance optimization and testing strategies.
